address_desc: We work remotely, providing services to clients worldwide. We are based in Grodno, but for your convenience, we are always available online. If a personal meeting is required, you can schedule a time in advance by calling the provided phone number.

priceDesc_1: At IV-SOFT, we closely monitor market trends to offer clients reasonable and justified prices while maintaining a high standard of quality in our services.

home_page.easy_to_create: Creating a website is easy with us
home_page.promote_company: Easily promote your company through us
home_page.fully_responsive_desc: Your website will look and work perfectly on any device, from smartphones to large screens.
home_page.fully_responsive_modal_desk: Our websites adapt to any device, be it a smartphone, tablet, or computer. This ensures your content always looks attractive and remains user-friendly, regardless of screen size. We use modern responsive design technologies to ensure user comfort.

We won't leave you without assistance, regardless of the complexity of the task or the time of your request.

home_page.web_design_desc: We create unique, stylish, and user-friendly designs for your website. We use modern tools to visually highlight your individuality.
home_page.seo_desc: We improve your website's visibility in search engines, attracting more clients. We optimize content, keywords, and technical aspects of your site to achieve high rankings on Google and other search engines. Your site will be easy to find and user-friendly.
home_page.web_development_desc: We use cutting-edge technologies like React, Node.js, Strapi, Tailwind CSS, which have proven their reliability and effectiveness in industry leaders like Instagram, Facebook, and Netflix.
home_page.responsive_design_dsc: We create websites that automatically adapt to any screen size, ensuring a seamless user experience on smartphones, tablets, and computers. Your site will look and function perfectly, no matter the device.
home_page.mission_title: Digital Solutions Designed for Your Success
home_page.mission_desc: We focus on functionality, design, and efficiency to ensure your website delivers tangible results. Our goal is to help you build customer trust and turn visitors into buyers. With us, your website becomes a reliable tool for achieving your objectives.
home_page.help_title: To achieve this, at IV-SOFT, we take the following steps:

home_page.seo_settings_title: Including Basic SEO Settings in Development

home_page.fast_loading_desc: We create pages that load quickly with any connection and are adapted for all devices, enhancing user convenience and supporting SEO.

pp.title: Privacy Policy of IV-SOFT
pp.this_privacy_policy: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the 'Policy') governs the collection, use, storage, and disclosure of information provided by users of web applications and services developed by the individual entrepreneur: Ivan Beznyak, operating under the brand IV-SOFT (hereinafter referred to as 'IE' or 'We').
pp.committed_to_maintaining: IV-SOFT is committed to ensuring the confidentiality and protection of personal data in compliance with applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other international standards.
pp.company_may_collect: We may collect the following types of data:
pp.provided_voluntarily: Personal data: Name, email address, phone number, and other data voluntarily provided by the user through forms.
pp.technical_data: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser data, operating system, and website behavior.
pp.cookie: Cookies: To enhance the user experience and analyze application performance.
pp.data_collected: Data is collected for the following purposes:
pp.improving_the_quality: Improving the quality of web applications and services.
pp.stores_personal: We store personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes of its processing and in accordance with the user's country's legislation. After achieving the purposes, the data is deleted or anonymized.
pp.does_not_transfer_data: The company does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
pp.engaging_service_providers: When engaging third-party service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics) who are obligated to maintain data confidentiality.
pp.data_transfer_countries: In case of data transfer to other countries, we ensure compliance with international privacy standards.
pp.depending_on_laws: Depending on the legislation of their country of residence, users may have the following rights:
pp.request_correction: Request correction or deletion of data.
pp.exercise_rights: To exercise their rights, users may contact us using the details provided on the website.
pp.company_takes_measures: We take technical and organizational measures to ensure data security, including:
pp.restricting_access: Restricting access to data to authorized employees only.
pp.company_reserves_right: We reserve the right to amend this Policy. Updates are published on the Company's official website. Users are encouraged to periodically check for changes.
pp.company_operates: We operate in accordance with international privacy standards and process data in compliance with the laws of the countries where users are located. For cross-border data transfers, mechanisms ensuring data protection, such as Standard Contractual Clauses, are used.
pp.have_any_questions: If you have any questions or inquiries related to this Policy, you can contact us using the details provided on the website.

aboutUs.welcome: We are a team of professionals passionate about creating modern, functional, and visually appealing websites and applications for businesses.
aboutUs.mission_desc: We aim to bring your ideas to life. Our solutions not only impress with their design but also provide user convenience and help achieve your goals.
aboutUs.why_choose_us_desc_1: Individual Approach. We thoroughly study your business to offer a unique solution that highlights your strengths.
aboutUs.why_choose_us_desc_2: Modern Technologies. We use the latest tools and methodologies, such as React and Node.js, to ensure your projects remain relevant and reliable.
aboutUs.our_value_desc_1: Quality. We always strive to create flawless products.
aboutUs.our_value_desc_2: Transparency. We maintain open communication with our clients at every stage of development.
aboutUs.our_value_desc_3: Long-Term Partnership. Our goal is to become a reliable partner, not just a contractor.
aboutUs.out_approach_des_1: IV-SOFT unites professionals who know how to turn your ideas into successful digital projects. We draw inspiration from our clients' challenges and develop solutions that help businesses grow and stand out from competitors.
aboutUs.out_approach_des_2: Our projects combine stylish design, user-friendliness, and modern technologies to satisfy even the most demanding users.

career.desc: At IV-SOFT, we believe that the key to success lies in talented and dedicated people. Our team consists of specialists who share a passion for technology, innovation, and high quality.
career.desc_2: Currently, we don't have any open vacancies, but we are always open to meeting talented professionals who strive for growth. If you'd like to join our team, send us your resume and tell us about yourself.

businessCardWebsite.name: Business Card Website Development
businessCardWebsite.what_it_is: A business card website is a compact, single-page site that contains all the essential information about your company, services, or products. This website is perfect for small businesses, individual entrepreneurs, and freelancers who do not require a complex and expensive site with many features.
businessCardWebsite.benefits_title: Advantages of a Business Card Website by IV-SOFT:
businessCardWebsite.benefits_1: Simplicity and convenience: quick and easy creation with minimal time and cost.
businessCardWebsite.benefits_2: Company information: the business card contains all necessary data: contacts, description of services, your history, and mission.
businessCardWebsite.benefits_3: Modern design: we create websites that attract attention and are easy for users to navigate.
businessCardWebsite.benefits_4: Responsiveness: your website will display perfectly on all devices, from mobile phones to PCs.
businessCardWebsite.benefits_5: SEO optimization: we ensure that your website is visible in search engines and attracts traffic.
businessCardWebsite.include_title: What does a business card website include?
businessCardWebsite.desc_1: Homepage: a brief greeting and your mission.
businessCardWebsite.desc_2: About Us: a description of your company, history, or personal brand.
businessCardWebsite.desc_3: Services/Products: a list of offered services or products with brief descriptions.
businessCardWebsite.desc_4: Contacts: your phone number, address, email, and a feedback form.
businessCardWebsite.desc_5: Social media links: the ability to connect with you through popular platforms.
businessCardWebsite.need_title: Why do you need a business card website?
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_1: Online presence: your business will be represented online 24/7.
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_2: Customer trust: having a website increases the level of trust in your company.
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_3: Ease of communication: customers can contact you directly through the website.
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_4: Promotion: easier to get listed in search engines and attract new clients.
businessCardWebsite.conclusion: A business card website is your first step toward creating a professional online presence. It is a tool that helps you showcase yourself, tell about your business, and establish contact with customers.
businessCardWebsite.small_desc_price: A business card website is perfect for presenting information about your company, services, or products. Includes pages about the company, services, contacts, and portfolio.
businessCardWebsite.additionInfo_3: Assistance with domain and hosting registration
businessCardWebsite.additionInfo_6: Installation of counters, analytics, and metrics

corporate-website.name: Corporate Website
corporate-website.what_it_is: In today’s world, a corporate website is much more than just a 'business card.' It’s the primary tool that addresses multiple aspects of your business. At IV-SOFT, we create websites that not only look stylish but truly work towards your success.
corporate-website.benefits_title: Why does your business need a corporate website?
corporate-website.benefits_1: Your clients and partners will always be with you. The website operates 24/7, providing information about your company, services, and contact details. This simplifies interaction and allows potential clients to easily find you when searching for exactly what you offer.
corporate-website.benefits_2: Enhances image and trust. A modern, professionally created website instills trust among clients and partners. It’s not just a showcase; it’s the face of your company that helps you stand out from competitors.
corporate-website.benefits_3: Increases sales and attracts new clients. Your website is always an accessible platform for sales, even when you’re not in the office. We create sites that bring in clients through SEO optimization, intuitive navigation, and well-thought-out contact forms.
corporate-website.benefits_4: Flexibility and scalability. We design websites to easily adapt to changing business needs. The more clients you have, the more opportunities your site has for development.
corporate-website.benefits_5: Process automation. With a corporate website, you can automate many business processes: from client registration to statistical data tracking and analytics. We integrate necessary CRM systems and other tools for efficient operations.
corporate-website.include_title: What will you receive when you order a website from us?
corporate-website.desc_1: Professional design reflecting your brand. Your website will be unique, just like your business. We’ll choose a style that best conveys the values and atmosphere of your company.
corporate-website.desc_2: Mobile adaptation. More clients are searching for information through smartphones and tablets today. We’ll ensure your site is convenient for both mobile users and PC users.
corporate-website.desc_3: Interactive features for your business. Whether it’s a contact form, live chat, or social media integration, the site will serve as an active tool for customer interaction.
corporate-website.desc_4: SEO optimization to get found. We’ll make your site visible in search engines so potential clients can easily find you using relevant business-related keywords.
corporate-website.desc_5: Comprehensive technical support. We don’t just create the site and leave you to it. After launch, we provide full technical support so you can always be confident your site is working at its best.
corporate-website.need_desc_1: Analysis and preparation: We study your business, goals, and needs to create a website that best suits your requirements.
corporate-website.need_desc_2: Design and planning: We develop a unique design and structure that highlights your brand’s individuality.
corporate-website.need_desc_3: Development: We create a functional and user-friendly website using the latest technologies.
corporate-website.need_desc_4: Testing and launch: We test the website on various devices and browsers to ensure stable performance.
corporate-website.need_desc_5: Support and improvements: We provide continuous support and make improvements as your business grows.
corporate-website.conclusion: Don’t delay your success. Order a corporate website from IV-SOFT and get a tool that works for you 24/7.
corporate-website.small_desc_price: A website for a large company with comprehensive information about activities, services, products, and contacts. Suitable for organizations with extensive functionality.
corporate-website.additionInfo_3: Assistance with domain and hosting registration

catalog-site.name: Catalog Website
catalog-site.what_it_is: A catalog website is more than just a showcase. It’s a convenient and modern way to display your assortment, making it easier for clients to choose. At IV-SOFT, we develop catalogs that help businesses grow and find new customers.
catalog-site.benefits_title: Why does your business need a catalog website?
catalog-site.benefits_1: Ease of selection. Convenient navigation and filters allow customers to quickly find the desired product or service, saving their time.
catalog-site.benefits_2: Access to information. The catalog provides your clients with detailed information about products: specifications, prices, photos, and even videos.
catalog-site.benefits_3: Building trust. A complete and neatly designed catalog demonstrates a serious approach to business, enhancing your reputation in the eyes of customers.
catalog-site.benefits_4: Scalability of the business. A catalog website opens doors to new markets, helping you sell products not only locally but across the country or even globally.
catalog-site.include_title: What makes our catalog websites special?
catalog-site.desc_1: User-friendliness: We design an interface that users enjoy. An intuitive design makes finding the desired product easy and pleasant.
catalog-site.desc_2: Effective structure: Categories, subcategories, filters, and sorting — everything to ensure clients don’t get lost and quickly find what they need.
catalog-site.desc_3: Modern visual solutions: Photo galleries, 3D previews of products, animations — all make the site vibrant and appealing.
catalog-site.desc_4: Flexibility in management: You can easily add new items, update prices, launch promotions or sales independently.
catalog-site.need_desc_1: Increased sales: Clients can familiarize themselves with your offering anytime, even at night.
catalog-site.need_desc_2: Audience expansion: Your site will be accessible to a wide audience, regardless of their location.
catalog-site.need_desc_3: Cost reduction: No more need to print catalogs or constantly update price lists. Everything can be done online.
catalog-site.need_desc_4: Sales analytics: We’ll connect analytical tools so you’ll know what interests your clients and which products sell best.
catalog-site.conclusion: A catalog website is your path to new heights. Attract clients, grow your business, and strengthen your market position with a catalog website from IV-SOFT.
catalog-site.small_desc_price: A website with a product or service catalog. Suitable for small stores or companies offering up to 100 items.
catalog-site.additionInfo_3: Assistance with domain and hosting registration

online-store.what_it_is: Want to take your sales to the next level? An online store is your reliable partner in the world of online trade. At IV-SOFT, we create stores that sell not just products but emotions.

online-store.benefits_1: Access to millions of buyers. Your products will be available to customers 24/7, no matter where they are — in the neighboring area or on the other side of the country.

quiz-site.name: Quiz Site by IV-SOFT: Turning Questions into Solutions
quiz-site.what_it_is: Interactive polls, tests, and quizzes are not only entertainment for users but also powerful tools for your business. A quiz site helps collect valuable data, engage with your audience, and increase conversions. If you want to attract attention and gain more insights into your clients, a quiz site is your perfect choice.

wedding-invitation-website.name: Wedding Invitation Website by IV-SOFT: Create an Unforgettable First Impression
wedding-invitation-website.what_it_is: A wedding is a special day, and every detail should be perfect. A wedding invitation site is a modern and elegant way to inform your loved ones and friends about your important event. This unique format not only allows you to share all the details of the celebration but also makes the invitation process convenient and stylish.
wedding-invitation-website.benefits_title: Why do you need a wedding invitation site?
wedding-invitation-website.benefits_1: Convenience and accessibility. All important details of your event — date, time, venue — are always at hand for guests, accessible anytime via the internet.
wedding-invitation-website.benefits_2: A place for your stories. Share your love story, showcase photos, add videos or even a mini-film — everything that makes your invitation unique.
wedding-invitation-website.benefits_3: Ease in organization. Guests can immediately confirm their attendance, choose dishes, or even ask questions, helping you save time and effort in preparation.
wedding-invitation-website.benefits_4: Customization. A wedding invitation site can be customized in any style — from classic to creative. The support for various themes and design solutions will create the atmosphere of your event.
wedding-invitation-website.benefits_5: A modern and original approach. This is not just a paper invitation — it’s a digital experience that will leave a lasting impression on your guests and be remembered for a long time.
wedding-invitation-website.include_title: What opportunities does a wedding invitation site provide?
wedding-invitation-website.desc_3: Gift collection: Create a list of desired gifts or wishes so that guests can easily choose what to give.
wedding-invitation-website.desc_4: Feedback: Your loved ones can leave wishes or messages, and you can easily track who wrote what.
wedding-invitation-website.desc_5: Photo and video gallery: Make the site even more personalized with images and videos to let your guests feel the atmosphere of your celebration in advance.
wedding-invitation-website.need_title: What will you get by choosing IV-SOFT to create your wedding invitation site?
wedding-invitation-website.need_desc_1: Customized design: We create a style that fully reflects your wedding concept — whether it’s minimalism or luxurious elegance.
wedding-invitation-website.need_desc_2: Ease of use: Guests can quickly and easily find all the information, even if they are unfamiliar with digital technologies.
wedding-invitation-website.need_desc_3: Multimedia support: The placement of photos, videos, and music will add atmosphere to the site and make it even more unique.
wedding-invitation-website.need_desc_4: Convenient attendance confirmation: Guests can confirm their attendance or decline, and also choose menu options for the banquet.
wedding-invitation-website.conclusion: A wedding invitation site is your chance to wow your guests and take the first step towards an unforgettable celebration. We’ll help create a site that reflects your style and conveys the atmosphere of your upcoming event. IV-SOFT — creating stylish and personalized wedding websites that will forever stay in your guests' memories.
wedding-invitation-website.small_desc_price: A unique wedding invitation site with personalized design and event program.
wedding-invitation-website.additionInfo_5: Assistance with domain and hosting registration

websites_for_government.name: Government Organization Website by IV-SOFT: Effective and Reliable Digital Solution
websites_for_government.what_it_is: In today’s digital society, government organizations must be accessible to citizens and businesses. A professionally developed website helps improve interaction with the public, enhance transparency, and simplify access to important information. We create websites that meet high standards of security, functionality, and user-friendliness.
websites_for_government.benefits_title: Why do you need a website for a government organization?
websites_for_government.benefits_1: Transparency and accessibility: Citizens and businesses should easily access information about the operations of government institutions, services, and regulations.
websites_for_government.benefits_2: Simplification of interaction with the population: Electronic applications, online consultations, and feedback options make interaction with government bodies more convenient and efficient.
websites_for_government.benefits_3: Compliance with government standards: We design websites that adhere to all regulatory requirements and standards, ensuring they comply with legislation and security.
websites_for_government.benefits_4: Information support: The website becomes a central information hub for citizens, where important news, documents, forms for applications, and reports are published.
websites_for_government.benefits_5: Digitization of processes: Moving services online speeds up processes, reduces the workload on staff, and makes it easier for citizens to access government services.
websites_for_government.include_title: What functions does a government organization website perform?
websites_for_government.desc_1: Publication of regulations and documents: All important documents, laws, and regulations are always available on the website.
websites_for_government.desc_2: E-services: The ability to submit applications and receive responses to inquiries online, simplifying administrative processes.
websites_for_government.desc_3: Feedback and consultations: Citizens can submit requests, ask questions, and receive consultations in a convenient form.
websites_for_government.desc_4: Relevant information and news: Regular updates about the actions and activities of the organization, news, events, and initiatives.
websites_for_government.desc_5: Notifications and alerts: A notification system for citizens about the status of their applications or changes in legislation.
websites_for_government.need_title: What will you get by choosing IV-SOFT for developing a government organization website?
websites_for_government.need_desc_1: Data security and protection: We ensure a high level of data protection, which is crucial for government websites handling confidential information.
websites_for_government.need_desc_2: Compliance with standards: All our projects adhere to government standards, legal norms, and regulations.
websites_for_government.need_desc_3: User-friendly interface: The website will be easy to navigate, allowing citizens to quickly find the necessary information and request services.
websites_for_government.need_desc_4: Mobile version and accessibility: All our websites are adapted for mobile devices, allowing citizens to access information anytime from any device.
websites_for_government.need_desc_5: Multifunctionality and flexibility: We create websites with multifunctionality, including various services — from submitting applications to online consultations.
websites_for_government.need_desc_6: Technical support and updates: We offer technical support and regular updates to keep the website current and operational.
websites_for_government.conclusion: A website for a government organization is not just a platform for information, but an essential tool to improve interaction with the public. We will help create a website that is user-friendly, adheres to all legislative and technical requirements. IV-SOFT — modern, secure, and effective solutions for government organizations.
websites_for_government.small_desc_price: Websites for government organizations with consideration for design and functionality requirements.
websites_for_government.additionInfo_4: Assistance with domain and hosting registration

website-support.name: Website Support from IV-SOFT
website-support.what_it_is: Your website is the face of your business on the internet. To keep it modern, secure, and effective, regular support is essential. At IV-SOFT, we offer professional website support services that will help your project perform at its best.
website-support.service_include_title: What is included in our services?
website-support.content_desc_1: Adding and updating texts, images, and multimedia.
website-support.content_desc_2: Creating new content for your pages.
website-support.security_desc_3: Protection against hacks and DDoS attacks.
website-support.analytics_desc_1: Integration and setup of analytics systems (Google Analytics).
website-support.analytics_desc_3: Reports on performance and improvement recommendations.
website-support.redesign_desc_1: Design updates according to modern trends.
website-support.redesign_desc_2: Site adaptation for mobile devices (Responsive Design).
website-support.redesign_desc_3: Improved structure and navigation for user convenience.
website-support.integration_automation_desc_1: CRM, ERP, and other external system connections.
website-support.integration_automation_desc_2: Setting up automated request handling and notifications.
website-support.integration_automation_desc_3: Payment system and online cash integration.
website-support.be_available: Be available to users 24/7. Imagine a potential customer visiting your website only to find it unavailable. That's lost opportunities and missed sales. Regular monitoring and technical support from IV-SOFT ensure your website will always work, regardless of the time or day.
website-support.safety_requirements: Meet modern security requirements. In today's digital world, cyberattack threats are growing. Hackers can steal your customers' data, infect your site with viruses, or completely disable it. We implement cutting-edge solutions to protect your resource: SSL certificates, regular updates, and vulnerability monitoring.
website-support.respond_to_customer: Respond to customer requests and search engines. Modern users expect up-to-date information on websites and convenient, user-friendly functionality. Additionally, search engines like Google only promote websites that meet SEO standards and are regularly updated. With our support, your site will always meet these requirements, ensuring high search engine rankings.
website-support.work_quickly: Work quickly and without interruptions. No one likes to wait for a website to load. Slow websites drive users away to competitors. We optimize loading speed, fix technical errors, and ensure uninterrupted operation, even under high loads.
website-support.small_desc_price: Maintenance and updates for your website: technical support, content filling, SEO.

SMM.name: Social Media Management from IV-SOFT — Your Success in the World of SMM
SMM.what_it_is: Social networks are a powerful tool for brand promotion, customer engagement, and sales growth. IV-SOFT offers professional SMM services (social media management) to make your business visible, successful, and appealing to your audience.
SMM.service_include_title: What does social media management from IV-SOFT include?
SMM.desc_2: Definition of a unique style and content concept.
SMM.desc_3: Building a content plan for the month or more.
SMM.content_desc_2: Professional post, story, and cover designs.
SMM.content_desc_3: Development of video and animated content.
SMM.security_desc_1: Publishing posts at a convenient time for your audience.
SMM.security_desc_2: Use of current hashtags and geotags to attract a new audience.
SMM.analytics_desc_3: Work with feedback and reputation management.
SMM.redesign_desc_3: Adjustment of the strategy to increase reach and conversions.
SMM.integration_automation: Setting up and managing advertising campaigns
SMM.integration_automation_desc_1: Development of effective targeted advertising campaigns.
SMM.integration_automation_desc_2: Setting up advertising in social networks: Facebook, Instagram, Google.
SMM.integration_automation_desc_3: Optimization of the budget to achieve maximum results.
SMM.support_important: What tasks does SMM from IV-SOFT solve?
SMM.be_available: Increasing brand recognition. We'll make thousands of people aware of your business.
SMM.safety_requirements: Increasing engagement. We'll attract attention to your content and create an active community.
SMM.respond_to_customer: Attracting new customers. We'll set up interactions with your audience to drive sales.
SMM.work_quickly: Creating a positive image. We'll help build trust with clients through quality content and feedback.
SMM.small_desc_price: Services for promoting your business on social networks: content, advertising, analytics.

localization-translation.name: Localization and Translation from IV-SOFT — Speak the Language of Success!
localization-translation.what_it_is: In today's world, business is becoming global, and it is crucial that your message reaches every target audience—regardless of language and cultural differences. IV-SOFT offers professional localization and translation services that will make your content clear and effective for different countries and cultures.
localization-translation.service_include_title: What does localization and translation from IV-SOFT include?
localization-translation.desc_1: Accurate and high-quality translation of materials.
localization-translation.desc_3: Account for nuances and stylistic elements, cultural relevance.
localization-translation.content_desc_1: Full adaptation of content to the target audience.
localization-translation.content_desc_2: Selection of key phrases and words relevant to the local market.
localization-translation.content_desc_3: Adjustment of text, images, and communication to local needs.
localization-translation.security_desc_1: Proper use of keywords to improve visibility in search engines in different languages.
localization-translation.security_desc_2: Adapting texts to the requirements of search engines in different countries (e.g., Google, Yandex).
localization-translation.security_desc_3: Attracting traffic and customers at the international level.
localization-translation.analytics_desc_1: Verification of translations by professional editors and native speakers.
localization-translation.analytics_desc_2: Strict control over grammar, style, and the accuracy of formulations.
localization-translation.analytics_desc_3: Guarantee of accuracy and truthfulness in every translated line.
localization-translation.redesign_desc_1: Creation of creative texts considering cultural nuances that will attract attention in other countries.
localization-translation.redesign_desc_2: Writing persuasive texts and slogans considering the local mentality.
localization-translation.redesign_desc_3: Working with logos, slogans, call-to-action (CTA) for maximum effect in different regions.
localization-translation.integration_automation_desc_1: Implementation of translated content on the website, considering technical compatibility and ease of display for different languages.
localization-translation.integration_automation_desc_2: Selecting the optimal format of content for website pages: adapting texts, images, buttons, and other elements to different localizations.
localization-translation.integration_automation_desc_3: Ensuring site functionality that displays and interacts correctly with users from different cultural and linguistic groups.
localization-translation.support_important: Why is localization and translation necessary?
localization-translation.be_available: Access to international markets. Make your product understandable and accessible to new countries and cultures.
localization-translation.safety_requirements: Audience expansion. Open new opportunities to attract customers from abroad.
localization-translation.respond_to_customer: Building brand trust. A well-translated and localized content creates a sense of professionalism and respect for the local culture.
localization-translation.work_quickly: Increasing conversions. Well-adapted content can better retain audiences and drive sales.
localization-translation.small_desc_price: Localization and translation of your website or content to expand your audience.

brief.title: Submit a Request for Our Services
brief.desc: Fill out a simple form so we can contact you and discuss all the details. It will only take a couple of minutes!

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) – Get Answers to Your Questions
FAQ.desc: Looking for answers to common questions? On this page, you'll find detailed answers to the most frequently asked questions about our services. Learn more and easily get the information you need.
FAQ.answer_1: We specialize in developing and supporting modern websites for businesses and personal projects. We offer a full range of services: from design and programming to deployment and support.
FAQ.ask_2: Which countries do you work with clients from?
FAQ.answer_2: We work with clients from anywhere in the world. Regardless of your location, you can take advantage of our services.
FAQ.ask_3: How does payment for services work?
FAQ.answer_3: We accept payments to bank accounts. Payment details will be provided after agreeing on the terms of cooperation.
FAQ.answer_4: We specialize in React, JavaScript, Strapi, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. We also use tools like Vite, Tailwind CSS, and React Helmet for optimization and ease of development.
FAQ.ask_5: Do you develop websites for any type of business?
FAQ.answer_5: Yes, we create websites for any type of business, regardless of its direction or scale.
FAQ.ask_6: How long does it take to develop a website?
FAQ.answer_6: The duration depends on the complexity of the project. On average, development takes 2 to 6 weeks, including testing and setup.
FAQ.answer_7: We offer support after development is completed, including updates, bug fixes, and consultations.
FAQ.answer_9: You can contact us via Telegram: @ivan_bezniak, phone: +375295210417, or email: ivsoft.ask@gmail.com. We are also happy to discuss details via email or any other convenient method.
FAQ.ask_10: Do you provide SEO optimization services?
FAQ.answer_10: Yes, we consider SEO principles when developing a website to ensure your project is visible in search engines.
FAQ.ask_11: Do you help with domain and hosting selection?
FAQ.answer_11: Yes, we provide consultations on domain and hosting selection and assist with their setup.
FAQ.ask_12: Do you work with multilingual websites?
FAQ.answer_12: Yes, we develop websites that support multiple languages so you can reach an international audience.
FAQ.answer_13: We guarantee quality development, fulfillment of all agreements, and post-launch support.
FAQ.ask_14: What do I need to start working on the project?
FAQ.answer_14: We will need a description of your project, goals, design preferences, and functionality. It's also helpful to provide materials such as text content or images if available.
FAQ.ask_15: What is the cost of website development?
FAQ.answer_15: The cost depends on the complexity and scope of work. We offer a flexible approach to pricing and agree on costs with each client individually.
FAQ.ask_16: How does the collaboration process work?
FAQ.answer_16: We start by discussing your project, then we develop a technical specification, approve the design and functionality. After development and testing, we publish the website and provide support.

contactsPage.contactsDescription: Ask a question or leave a request, and we'll respond as soon as possible.

portfolioPage.title: Portfolio – IV-SOFT
portfolioPage.desc: Welcome to the IV-SOFT portfolio page! We specialize in creating modern, functional, and reliable web applications using the best technologies such as React, Node.JS, Strapi, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS. Our solutions are tailored to customer needs and provide an excellent user experience.
portfolioPage.func_1: Intuitive interface for easy booking of sessions.
portfolioPage.func_2: Multilingual support to attract clients from different nationalities.
portfolioPage.func_3: Responsive design for comfortable viewing on any device.
portfolioPage.func_4: Fast page loading due to optimized code.
portfolioPage.func_5: SEO support for improving website visibility in search engines.
portfolioPage.func_2_1: Attractive and appetizing design creating a positive impression of the brand.
portfolioPage.func_2_3: Payment through WebPay site for convenient transaction processing.
portfolioPage.func_2_4: User-friendly admin panel for adding menus, allowing fast updating of the assortment.
